titleStmt.title: An epistle apologetical of S.C. to a person of honour touching his vindication of Dr. Stillingfleet.
titleStmt.author: Cressy, Serenus, 1605-1674.

notesStmt.note: A reply to Edward Hyde, Earl of Clarendon's Animadversions upon a book intituled Fanaticism fanatically imputed to the Catholick Church by Dr. Stillingfleet.
Imperfect: Pages faded with some loss of print. Pages 76-97 from the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York spliced at end.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
